attributes.action: LETS GET BACK TO A GOOD MORAL SOCIETY AND VALUES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NO TERRORISM  SUICIDE BOMBINGS,HONOUR KILLINGS,BEHEADING.
[THIS IS A DIFFERENT RELIGION TO OUR CHRISTIAN COUNTRY.]
PROTECT AND SAVE OUR CHURCHES AND OUR CHRISTMAS
[WHICH HAVE ALWAYS PROVIDED THE BEST  MORAL SOCIETY&VALUES].
NO MOSQUES[IF THEY PREACH EVIL AND SELF DOMINATION]  
NO STEALING OF OTHER PEOPLES DATA,IDENTITY .
NO FULL PRISONS[WHY DOES THE TAXPAYER HAVE TO FOOT THE BILL FOR SUPER PRISONS WHEN THEY HAVE BEEN FILLED TO BREAKING POINT BY FOREIGN NATIONALS]
NO DRUGS [CREATING BAD SOCIETY AND DRUG TRAFFICKING AND MONEY LAUNDERING].
NO HOMELESS[WE DO NOT TREAT THE FOREIGN NATIONALS IN THE SAME WAY AND THATS HAD A GREAT IMPACT ON OUR HOUSING]
OUR CHURCHES HAVE ALWAYS HELPED THE HOMELESS BY DROP IN CENTRES,SOUP KITCHENS ETC.
LOYALTY TO ONES COUNTRY AND HISTORY[NOT SECRETIVE AND UNWILLING TO FIGHT FOR ONES COUNTRY] 
NO BAD RELIGION TO TAKE OVER AND DICTATE TO COUNTRIES WITH THEIR OWN GOOD RELIGION,WHICH HAS ALWAYS SERVED THEM WELL. 
[TO TRY AND ACHIEVE WORLD DOMINATION]

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
